author: jta
msg: DERBY-2428:  Point the 10.2.1.6 downloads to archive.apache.org/dist.
Also changed the derby_downloads.html section heading for prior releases
from "Previous Official Releases" to "Archived Official Releases".

author: cschoett
msg: Added a number of new drts for controls interceptors, only one test existed previously and that test was only that a control with interceptor annotations could be complied.  The new tests verify runtime behavior of interceptors as well as interceptor prioritization.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Using a consistent level of servlet API across modules as Jetty6 and Tomcat6 depend on javax.servlet 2.5. Added one method to the Axis2 binding impl of ServletContext required in 2.5.
